text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Hmmm♪ Hmmm♪ Hmm-hm-hmmmm～～～♪ 
……Alright, all ready!

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
……Oh my. What happened? 
Where'd the usual sleepyhead go!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Eehehe～, Heart-chan, good mornin'～☆ 
Looking for a hug? An energy chargin' hug of love♡

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
No way! Last time when you said 『Oka Sho was the worst～! Cheer 
me up～!』 you'd come beg me for hugs even during bath time.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
……You said you were transferring to <Ascella> right? 
For now, do you think things will go well?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Of courseーーー! It's me after all? The genius～? 
From here on, things'll just get better and better for sure!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Right, this is where everything starts! 
From now on, it's a straight line to a sparkly future!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: (Everything until now, well……some things just happened——)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(No, no, but! In the beginning things were going 
so well, you know? I'm a genius after all! Since 
coming here, things have been going well!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(That Selection Race was an easy 1st place, wasn't it? 
And someone came to scout me so quickly, right?)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(And there were so many amazing senpai, 
it was a great team——)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Ah, she's here! Pandora-chan～! 
Good work in the 『Flower C』 earlier.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Eehehe～, Bono-senpai, thanks～☆ 
And Mirako-senpai came to cheer me on right!? Thanks for that♡

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
No, no～. 2nd place, you were so close, huh? 
……Ah, but still, getting 2nd in a Classic-grade 
major race is normally pretty amazing isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wait, in your debut you finished 6 lengths ahead of 2nd 
place, and then went straight to a race that determines 
the Junior class Queen, the 『Hanshin JF』. And got 3rd!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Well～, it took 10 races for me to win though, 
so I think it's an impressive record～.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Eehehe～ I see, see, see! As expected of me, I guess～!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
So far, 6 races with 2 wins, and I've only been off the 
scoreboard only once! Eh, awesome! No way! Just genius～♡

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
But still, after this, I'm just gonna keep on going! 
I'll become a legend! Just watch me～☆

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Yep yep, we'll be looking forward to it♪ 
Then, shall we get started with today's training!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Okaaay～♡ ……Ah, senpai, have you been to the store today? 
They had some new products that were reaaally lovely——

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
……Alright, Pandora. Next up is finally the first leg of the Triple 
Tiara, the 『Oka Sho』. We need to be more motivated than ever.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
First, I'll show you the new training menu. Until we start making 
our final adjustments, we'll focus on high intensity training——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
No, no, no, Trainer, before that～! In prep for such an 
important race, isn't there something else we need to do?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: The first thing! Is to raise our spiritsーーー☆

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Ahahahahaa, c'mon everyone, over here～!! 
Let's ride that one next～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Wah wah, wait, wait～! 
But, Pandora-chan, is it okay for you to still be playing?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Starting tomorrow, you're training for the 『Oka Sho』 right? 
Won't you be a little tired……?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
I'm telling you it'll be fine☆ 
C'mon, c'mon, Mirako-senpai too!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Ahaha……well, if it's getting her motivated it's fine……I guess? 
Okay～, I'm coming～.

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
No, that can't be fine. 
Geez, that Pandora……

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
That girl, she doesn't seem to be serious at all……this whooooole 
time she's been like that. Do you think she'll be okay?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
Ahahaha! She's quite the unruly pony-chan isn't she? Even though 
Trainer-san tried so hard to stop her, she still insists on playing.

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text: That said——her potential really is something to look forward to.

text_block_list.name: North Flight
text_block_list.text:
Really! In the last team measurements, her times were 
really good weren't they? Compared to the average times 
for the Classic class in spring, she's a cut above.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
……But that's exactly why this can't continue. 
Especially if she's aiming to win in Classic races.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Like this……without being hard-working and diligent, 
running by only relying on her talent, then most likely——

text_block_list.name: Host
text_block_list.text:
——Well then Fusaichi Pandora-san, the 『Oka Sho』 is 
coming up soon! Could you tell us your thoughts?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Okaaaay♡ My thoughts, huh? 
Well, that's of course——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm a genius. 
It won't be just the 『Oka Sho』 that I win——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: The "Triple Tiara" too! I plan to aim for that too♡

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ——『That's why♡』——『That's why』——『Why』——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: ……Why?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
——The 『Oka Sho』, the number 2 favorite, Fusaichi Pandora, 
takes a surprising 14th! The result is an utter defeat……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Whyyyy～～～～～～～!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Aaaahh～～～!! 
Are you seriousーーーーーー!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Ahh～geez, I hate this, I hate it I hate it I hate it, this is 
the wooooorst……!! How did things turn out like this～……!?)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Seriously, a blowout loss at the 『Oka Sho』!? Even though I'm 
a genius! The tiaras, all of them were supposed to be mine～……!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(But, I went and said it!? To my senpais on the team, my classmates, 
and my parents……and at the press conference! In front of everyone!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(I'll get the Triple Tiara～…… 
So, so, so……embarrassing～～～～!!)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
……Aaaaahhーーーgeez!! 
I can't do this! I'm so doneーー

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text: Ah! There she is. Pandora-chan～……!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Ah? ……Huh, senpai. What's wrong? 
And why are you still in your uniforms? It's training time isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
You……you really haven't been checking our team's LANE, have you? 
C'mon, it doesn't matter what you're wearing so let's go.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Go where? ……Wah, wait! 
W-what are you doing～!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Haaaa!? An 『Oka Sho』 review session～～～!?

text_block_list.name: Jungle Pocket
text_block_list.text:
……what do you mean by "Haaaa!?". 
Of course we're going to do this.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Akebono
text_block_list.text:
Video was captured from so many angles and Trainer-san prepared a 
bunch of it, you know～! Let's watch it together and talk about it.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
No, no, no, a video!? From all angles!? 
It's all just about me getting crushed isn't it!?

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: No way, no way! I don't wanna watch that again～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text: Pandora!! ……Just listen, okay?

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I regret that I wasn't able to guide you properly…… 
Though I suppose you could call this result 『Expected』.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
You……when it comes to training for the 『Oka Sho』, you never once 
trained at full strength. You never once got serious, did you?

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
The Triple Tiara races aren't so easy that you 
can win like that. ……That's why, let's reflect 
on that and work together for next time.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Coming to terms with your 『Oka Sho』 loss, and reviewing your running 
is an important first step. ……It's okay, take a seat Pandora.

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: …………No way. I won't watch.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text: Wha—……wait, Pandora! Doing that——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: No way! No way no way no way no way, I can't!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Not serious, not easy!? What's with that!? 
I don't know what you mean, no way no way no wayーーー!!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Miracle
text_block_list.text:
Wai- Pandora-chan!? Oh man～～～…… 
Um, well……it would be better to go after her, right……?

text_block_list.name: Fuji Kiseki
text_block_list.text:
No……let's wait a bit. If we were to go after her now, 
she'd probably just run away. ……What do you think, Trainer-san?

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text: ……That's right. It seems like my words won't reach her.

text_block_list.name: Team Trainer
text_block_list.text:
I'll——think things over. 
About what to do for her, and what's best for Pandora——

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa. ……I don't get it. 
I don't understand, I hate this, ahh～～～geez!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Daaaaa～～～～!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Ngyaa!!

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text: Whoa!?
